articles.title: Blood in the water after 'Bachelorette' contestants get a little too aggressive during game - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: Tuesday marked the beginning of Tayshia Adams journey as "The Bachelorette," and two suitors became so competitive that one was left with a bloody lip.
articles.content:
Tuesday marked the beginning of Tayshia Adamss journey on The Bachelorette. She replaced Clare Crawley, who exited the show after only four episodes because she fell in love with Dale Moss.
